channel.title: CVE Feed for Dario Curasì -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-37522|2024-07-21T07:10:16.394Z -- dario%20curas%C3%AC -- cc%20%26%20bcc%20for%20woocommerce%20order%20emails
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Dario Curasì CC & BCC for Woocommerce Order Emails allows Stored XSS.This issue affects CC & BCC for Woocommerce Order Emails: from n/a through 1.4.1.
